mapper.sql: pid, plat_no, clear_date, recharge_sum_inside, recharge_sum_outside, recharge_count_inside, recharge_count_outside, withdrawals_sum_inside, withdrawals_sum_outside, withdrawals_count_inside, withdrawals_count_outside, recharge_count_plat, recharge_sum_plat, withdrawals_count_plat, withdrawals_sum_plat, liquidation, liquidation_recordtime, balance_sum, balance_bank, book_balance
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from clear_result_summary
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into clear_result_summary (pid, plat_no, clear_date, recharge_sum_inside, recharge_sum_outside, recharge_count_inside, recharge_count_outside, withdrawals_sum_inside, withdrawals_sum_outside, withdrawals_count_inside, withdrawals_count_outside, recharge_count_plat, recharge_sum_plat, withdrawals_count_plat, withdrawals_sum_plat, liquidation, liquidation_recordtime, balance_sum, balance_bank, book_balance) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clear_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recharge_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recharge_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recharge_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recharge_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawals_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawals_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawals_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawals_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recharge_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recharge_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawals_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawals_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{liquidation,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{liquidation_recordtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance_sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balance_bank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{book_balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update clear_result_summary set pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plat_no = #{record.plat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clear_date = #{record.clear_date,jdbcType=DATE}, recharge_sum_inside = #{record.recharge_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_sum_outside = #{record.recharge_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_count_inside = #{record.recharge_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_count_outside = #{record.recharge_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_sum_inside = #{record.withdrawals_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_sum_outside = #{record.withdrawals_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_count_inside = #{record.withdrawals_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_count_outside = #{record.withdrawals_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_count_plat = #{record.recharge_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_sum_plat = #{record.recharge_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_count_plat = #{record.withdrawals_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_sum_plat = #{record.withdrawals_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, liquidation = #{record.liquidation,jdbcType=CHAR}, liquidation_recordtime = #{record.liquidation_recordtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance_sum = #{record.balance_sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance_bank = #{record.balance_bank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, book_balance = #{record.book_balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update clear_result_summary set plat_no = #{plat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clear_date = #{clear_date,jdbcType=DATE}, recharge_sum_inside = #{recharge_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_sum_outside = #{recharge_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_count_inside = #{recharge_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_count_outside = #{recharge_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_sum_inside = #{withdrawals_sum_inside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_sum_outside = #{withdrawals_sum_outside,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_count_inside = #{withdrawals_count_inside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_count_outside = #{withdrawals_count_outside,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_count_plat = #{recharge_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recharge_sum_plat = #{recharge_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdrawals_count_plat = #{withdrawals_count_plat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdrawals_sum_plat = #{withdrawals_sum_plat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, liquidation = #{liquidation,jdbcType=CHAR}, liquidation_recordtime = #{liquidation_recordtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance_sum = #{balance_sum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance_bank = #{balance_bank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, book_balance = #{book_balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clear_result_summary(plat_no,clear_date,recharge_sum_inside,recharge_count_inside, withdrawals_sum_inside,withdrawals_count_inside) (SELECT plat_no,clear_date,SUM(recharge_sum_inside),SUM(recharge_count_inside), SUM(withdrawals_sum_inside),SUM(withdrawals_count_inside) FROM clear_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(clear_date,'%Y%m%d')=#{clear_date} GROUP BY plat_no)
mapper.select: SELECT p.plat_no,#{clear_date} clear_date, IFNULL(withdrawals_sum_plat,0) withdrawals_sum_plat, IFNULL(withdrawals_count_plat,0) withdrawals_count_plat, IFNULL(recharge_sum_plat,0) recharge_sum_plat, IFNULL(recharge_count_plat,0) recharge_count_plat FROM plat_paycode p left join (select r.plat_no,r.pay_code, SUM(trans_amt) as recharge_sum_plat, COUNT(1) as recharge_count_plat from eacc_accountamtlist e left join rw_recharge r on e.trans_serial = r.trans_serial where r.trans_code IN ('CP0001','P00008','C00004') and DATE_FORMAT(e.account_date,'%Y%m%d') = #{clear_date} GROUP BY r.plat_no,r.pay_code )a on p.plat_no = a.plat_no and p.pay_code = a.pay_code left join (select r.plat_no,r.pay_code, SUM(out_amt) as withdrawals_sum_plat, COUNT(1) as withdrawals_count_plat from (select trans_serial,account_date from eacc_accountamtlist) e left join rw_withdraw r on e.trans_serial = r.trans_serial and r.pay_status = '20' where r.trans_code = 'WP0001' and DATE_FORMAT(e.account_date,'%Y%m%d') = #{clear_date} GROUP BY r.plat_no,r.pay_code )b on b.plat_no = p.plat_no and b.pay_code = p.pay_code where p.pay_code is not null and p.pay_code != ''
